AliceMargatroid:DollAmbushPower.NAME: Doll Ambush
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever a #yDoll is #yRecycled, let it #yAct
time(s).

AliceMargatroid:DollWarPower.NAME: Doll War
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever a #yDoll is #yPlaced, increase its Max HP by #b%d.

AliceMargatroid:DollJudgePower.NAME: Doll Judgement
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever a #yDoll is #yRecycled, Alice gains #b%d%% of its Block.

AliceMargatroid:CallToDollsPower.NAME: Call To Dolls
DESCRIPTIONS: In #b%d turn(s), receive #b50%% more damage from #yDolls.

AliceMargatroid:DollActivationPower.NAME: Doll Activation
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of your turn, your rightmost #yDoll #Acts once.
At the end of your turn, your rightmost
#yDolls each #Act once.

AliceMargatroid:MaliceSparkPower.NAME: Malice Spark
DESCRIPTIONS: Reduce your max hand size by
this turn.

AliceMargatroid:AliceExtraTurnPower.NAME: Extra Turn
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain an extra turn after this one.
Gain an extra turn after this one. #b%d times remaining.

AliceMargatroid:MaidensBunrakuPower.NAME: Maiden's Bunraku
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever a #yDoll #yActs, it gains #b%d Block.

AliceMargatroid:UsokaePower.NAME: Usokae
DESCRIPTIONS: For each enemy, if there is a alicemargatroid:Doll in the corresponding slot, negate all debuffs from that enemy.

AliceMargatroid:DevilryLightPower.NAME: Devilry Light
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of next turn, apply #b%d #yWeak to ALL enemies.

AliceMargatroid:ArtfulChanterPower.NAME: Artful Chanter
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever a alicemargatroid:Doll is alicemargatroid:Placed, if there is already a alicemargatroid:Doll in the same slot, the newer alicemargatroid:Doll alicemargatroid:Acts #b%d extra time(s).

AliceMargatroid:MagicianRayPower.NAME: Magician Ray
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of next turn, lose #b%d #yStrength.

AliceMargatroid:LuminousShanghaiDollPowe.NAME: Luminous Shanghai Doll
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever a non- #yShanghai #yDoll #yActs, let a random #yShanghai #yDoll #yAct #b%d extra time(s).

AliceMargatroid:SeaOfSubconsciousnessPow.NAME: Sea of Subconsciousness
DESCRIPTIONS: After playing a card in hand, if there is a alicemargatroid:Doll with the same order as the card, it alicemargatroid:Acts #b%d time(s).

AliceMargatroid:SwordOfLightPower.NAME: Sword of Light: Supernova
DESCRIPTIONS: The first #yAttack played each turn deals #b50% more damage.

AliceMargatroid:PrincessFormPower.NAME: Princess Form
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you play a 1-cost card, add #b%d copy(ies) with alicemargatroid:Phantom to your hand. NL alicemargatroid:Phantom cards do not trigger this effect.

AliceMargatroid:FuturisticBunrakuPower.NAME: Futuristic Bunraku
DESCRIPTIONS: This turn, whenever you play a card, %s #yActs once. NL At the end of this turn, #yRecycle %s.

AliceMargatroid:ForbiddenMagicPower.NAME: Forbidden Magic
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever a #yDoll is #Placed, lose #b%d #yalicemargatroid:Well_Laid_Plans.

AliceMargatroid:SemiAutomatonPower.NAME: Semi-Automaton
DESCRIPTIONS: After you #yPlace next #yDoll, let it #yAct #b%d times.

AliceMargatroid:GeyserPower.NAME: Geyser
DESCRIPTIONS: Increase Block gained from cards by #b%d%%.

AliceMargatroid:TauntedPower.NAME: Taunted
DESCRIPTIONS: In #b%d turns, can only attack the #b%d th #yDoll slot (from right to left).

AliceMargatroid:UnlockMysticPower.NAME: Unlock Mystic
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you trigger #yCommand, gain [E], and draw #b1 cards. NL Each unique name of cards can only trigger this once.
Triggered cards: NL
